content: I think I'll start looking for some new scarves online or at the mall this weekend. I've been really into scarves lately, and it's always fun to add some new pieces to my wardrobe. Speaking of new pieces, I've been meaning to get my new jeans hemmed. I got them last month from that outlet store downtown, and they're a bit too long. Do you think I should try to hem them myself or take them to a tailor?
